title: 85/389/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 July 1985 amending Council Decision 82/732/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Czechoslovakia approved for the purposes of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 15 July 1985
amending Council Decision 82/732/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Czechoslovakia approved for the purposes of importing fresh meat into the Community
(85/389/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 82/732/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 July 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 59, 5. 3. 1983, p. 34.
(3) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 67.
(4) OJ No L 167, 27. 6. 1984, p. 34.
(5) OJ No L 311, 8. 11. 1982, p. 7.
(6) OJ No L 105, 18. 4. 1984, p. 23.
(7) OJ No L 108, 26. 4. 1983, p. 18.
ANNEX
